column6: Top Ability Rules
column16: Bottom Ability Rules

column6: Summon a plant that is 5 feet wide and up to X feet long or tall
column9: should specify, grow an existing plant? Or do we want plants growing in even sterile environments?
column16: Create 1 foot thick wall, X+Y tall and wide, up to X feet away
column21: should the range be a static 5/10 feet? Most of the time it'll be non-divisible by 5 anyway

column6: Target is revived from downed state, their health becomes X or their max HP, whichever is lower
column16: X are targeted, healed by Y amount. Exhaust a card.

column6: Return card from discard
column16: Return 3 cards from discard
column20: Coalescing Thoughts/Reconsider Plans/Reflecting Moment/Building a Plan
column21: kinda feels underpowered for an exhaust. Maybe make it 4 cards?

column6: You may move a token from one target to another
column9: moving a single token, even it this card returns to hand, feels exceptionally weak… maybe move up to 2 tokens?
column16: Add X to attack value
column21: This feels too boring. It's the kind of thing I'd always want to be playing if I had the choice, it's just a good attack. Doesn't relate to pinpoint at all, because there's not cost to try and focus, it feels like making a called show but without any challenge... maybe contesdted influence to get the extra damage?

column6: Topple if damage is dealt
column16: For each attack made against you, immediately after attack that enemy

column6: On success, targets next roll of any kind is reduced by X
column9:
like destiny swap, but requires succeed influence, and reduces by x instead of Min…
maybe needs to last more rounds? Acutally what I like better, make all their rolls reduce by X instead of just the first
column16: Target adds X to next attack or defense value

column6: add X to attack value if marked, then remove mark from target
column16: Mark target if damage is dealt

column6: Transform into similar-sized creature. Add X to defense values or attack values for the duration. After duration, lose Y in Health Points
column16:
Summon either: 
Large Plant [all die=your influence die, range 5ft, health=X, no movement] 
Medium Creature [attack die=2 * X, defense=X, range 5ft, health=Y, movement=20 ft]

column6: Attack target up to X times, and lose X health per attack
column16: Lose X health points. Increase all defense values by X

column6: Heal target by X
column16: Target returns 1 card from discard

column6: Increase range by 5 feet and movement by 15 feet
column16: Attack target twice, lose 15 feet of movement

column6: Add X to next defense value
column16: If next defense value is greater than opposing attack value, attacker takes difference in damage

column6: Add X to the next influence roll. Choose 1: add 25 movement, or return a target card from discard
column16: Either add X to next Attack Value or add X to your next Defense Value.

column6: At a range of X*5 feet, create a 15 ft diameter smoke screen. Applies No Sight to any creature within
column16: On success, target cannot target you with more than one action on their turn

column6: On success, target is forced to perform 1 specific 6-second duration non-violent action on their next turn, up to GM discretion
column16: On success, discard a card and gain knowledge of enemies actions

column6: If target bares one of your Attack Tokens, you may remove the token and attack the target again.
column16: Return X consumed tokens

column6: If marked, target movement is reduced to 0, then remove a mark from the target
column16: Attack up to X targets, if damage would be dealt mark them instead

column6: Consume an Attack Token. Add X to your range for this turn
column16: Consume an Attack Token, add X to attack

column6: Target adds your Influence Die to all their Defense Values
column16: On success move all of your placed tokens onto Target Enemy

column4: Attack    X = Attack Reduced    Y = Level
column6: Reduce this attack value by X, X cannot exceed Y, you may add X to your next attack value
column16: Reduce this attack value by X. If damage is still dealt then deal X twice to damage to that target
column20: Wager is poor against enemies with high defense, no need to change it?

column6: On success, discard a card, and target cannot attack you
column16: On success, discard a card, and target must attack you with at least one action if you are in their range.

column6: Summon Y beings with 1 health. They deal Y unblockable damage. Their movement is 30 ft
column16: Summon a being with X health. Its Attack/Defense Value is X. Its movement is equal to 30 ft

column6: Lose up to X health points, return Y cards from discard
column16: Exhaust a card, exchange a card from discard with a card from your deck, which goes into discard.

column6: If damage is dealt, target's next defense roll is reduced by X
column16: Recover a consumed Contact Token. if no Contact Tokens can be recovered, recover 2 cards from discard instead

column6: Discard X cards, heal for X+Y
column16: Discard X card, return X cards from discard

column6: Discard a card
column16: Attack target

column6: If target is marked, add X to attack value. Heal for however much damage was dealt, if any, then remove a mark
column16: If target is marked, topple target and reduce their next defense by 1d4, then remove a mark

column6: Add X to attack value. On damage being dealt, enemy is moved X*5 feet away from you
column16: Consume Attack Token. All targets in 5*X ft area roll Defense against the attack

column4: X = Level  Y = coin flip/even-odd die roll
column6: When next attacked, first roll a die. If even, take no damage from that attack. If odd, add X to your Defense Value.
column16: If the targeted enemy attacks you before your next turn then add X to your Defense Value

column6: If your attack deals damage to Target, then that Targets next Influence Roll will use a reduced die down to a minimum of a 1d4
column16: On success targets next Attack or Defense die are reduced down to a minimum 1d4.

column6: For next attack against you, if damage is taken, attack in response. Otherwise, return a target card from discard
column16: For next attack against you, if no damage is taken, target is toppled

column6: Reduce this attack value by X, if damage is still dealt then heal for X and deal X additional damage
column16: Mark Target

column6: All attacks against you are reduced by X. You may not attack with your other action
column16: If damage is dealt, target and targets within 5ft are marked

column6: Force a re-roll of target's next die roll
column16:
Choose either:
1) lowest roll of target's next action is treated as max
2) highest roll of target's next action is treated as min

column6: On success, target's next die rolls are rolled twice, and the lower value must be used
column16: Use a consumable. It has a 50% chance of not being consumed

column6: Gain  30 ft. of movement
column16: Select a direction. Select a space within 5ft of you. While active, anyone on that space may jump X ft in the selected direction

column6: After your attack, gain 5 ft. of movement. This movement doesn't proc Overstep
column16: Gain 1 Overstep Attack per round

column6:
Effects depending on X:
1-3: cause Distraction on enemy
4-6: target attacks specified enemy for 1 turn
7+: target attacks specified enemy for Y rnds
column16: Gain +1 to influence rolls

column6: Square terrain of size Y (up to 30ft) is harmful: any movement into, out of, or through an area results in X damage for every 5 ft.
column16: On success, target's movement is set to 0, unless they spend an action attacking their bindings

column6: If one of the die used for your Attack Value is less than X, you may reroll that die
column16: Lose X life.

column6: In response to the next Overstep Attack made against you, attack the aggressor
column16: Gain X movement before or after your attack

column6: If damage is dealt then return Target Card from the Discard Pile to your Hand
column16: You may reroll your attack roll, if you do then discard a card. This can be repeated up to X times.

column6: After attacking target, add X to your next Defense Value
column16: Add X to the Attack Value. Reduce your next Defense Value by X

column6: If damage would be dealt then instead Target cannot gain Health points
column16: If Attack Value is greater than or equal to double Target Defense Value then instead Target Skips their next turn and no damage is dealt

column6: You may consume an influence token to remove one defense die from the enemy's defense rolls for this attack
column16: Your flesh hardens adding X to all Defense Values

column6: Select an area that is 25 feet by 25 feet. Discard X cards. You may move any tokens placed on Target Enemies to other Targeted Enemies.
column16: On success you may return any amount of your tokens on Target Enemy

column6: Conform the space around you to encapsulate you in a shell. While in the shell you cannot see out. The shell has Y health.
column16: On success, the enemy is encapsulated in a shell. The shell has X life. While the Target is in the shell they cannot see out.

column6: Create an aura on you that is 15 feet in diameter. All allies in this add X to their Defense Value
column16: Create an aura on you that is 15 feet in diameter. Any enemy that walks into the aura takes X damage.

column6: Summon a similar sized object/creature within 5 feet of you. It has no movement. Its Health is Y and it heals for X per turn. It has no attack/defense/influence die. If you take damage instead the summon takes the damage.
column16: Summon a human sized object/creature within 5 feet of Target. The Summon has health and die equal to yours. While this Summon is active you cannot roll for Attack values.

column6: If an enemy moves in or out of your range, then respond with an attack
column16: If Target moves in or out of range then attack Target and add Y to the Attack Value

column6: On success, target cannot make any Overstep Attacks
column16: Pick an adjacent 5 ft. square. Movement through this space consumes an additional 10 ft. of movement

column6: Exhaust a card. Pick an adjacent 5 ft. square. The next creature entering this area takes Y damage for X rnds
column16: Pick an adjacent 5 ft. square. The next creature entering this area takes Y damage

column4: Attack    X = Level    Y = 1/2 damage received
column6: If damaged in previous round, from an enemy's attack, add X & Y to attack
column16: If damage is dealt, Enemy movement is reduced by 10 ft next round

column6: if adjacent to ally, swap places with them. Add X to next defense or attack value
column16: if adjacent to ally, swap places with them. Heal for X
